projects.title: PGN Player
projects.subtitle: а viewer for chess games
projects.description:
PGN Player is a viewer that allows visualizing chess games by loading their text notation. Chess game is loaded either in .PGN file format or as a plain text.

I developed this application with the idea to view and analyze my chess games and openings. Having searched for applications of this type, I had not found any that suited my needs. This is how I had the idea to create my own application. Started in 2023 it was initially coded in Vanilla JS. The current version is remade in React, Redux & TypeScript. (work in progress...)
